ComicInfo.Summary: 'THE VOICE' While the brokers of information celebrate at a fundraiser in Washington D.C., a new member is recruited to join the war between the corporate news media and the cult of the VOICE. Also, drinks are on the Hand during an incendiary guys night out.
ComicInfo.Tags: New York City,United States Senate,Washington D.C.
ComicInfo.Title: Chapter Two: The Voice
ComicInfo.Characters: Jacob R.
